function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation spread on social media about health-related issues","Impact":"Causes public confusion and potential harm from following false information","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking systems and increase health literacy among social media users","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms for detecting fake news, educational campaigns on health-related topics","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Low propensity of physicians to use social media for knowledge sharing due to high occupational stress","Impact":"Limited access to updated medical knowledge and information sharing among healthcare professionals","Mitigation":"Provide incentives and support systems for physicians to encourage knowledge sharing on social media, reduce occupational stress through work-life balance initiatives","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms for healthcare professionals, mental health support systems","People":"Physicians, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, professional organizations"},{"Description":"Increased circulation of misinformation during health crises and pandemics","Impact":"Undermines public trust, creates panic, and hinders effective crisis response","Mitigation":"Invest in knowledge translation platforms, implement fact-checking and validation systems, promote authoritative sources of information","Technologies":"Knowledge translation platforms, crisis communication technologies, fact-checking algorithms","People":"Public, public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
